title: British whistleblower Raphael Marshall testifies to “chaos” of Afghanistan evacuation
content:
1. British whistleblower Raphael Marshall testifies to “chaos” of Afghanistan evacuation  The Washington Post
  2. LIVE: British officials give evidence to lawmakers on government policy on Afghanistan  Reuters
  3. Boris Johnson intervened to evacuate animal charity from Kabul, says whistleblower  BBC News
  4. WorldView: Whistleblower condemns U.K. evacuation of Afghanistan  CBS News
  5. Pen Farthing: ‘Animals in a cargo hold never got in the way of people getting on a flight’  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
